content: hello everybody halloween is coming closer and closer and this week i am bringing you a most spooky pattern for a reversible ghost that s right this amigurum is an inside-out reversible flippable whatever you want to name it you might know this guy from teeturtle which is where i got the idea from back when i originally made this lil guy this year for my husband s birthday i made a girl version so our little ghost-chan would have a girlfriend whether you make one or two or 20 what colors you use what facial expressions this guy is highly customizable and just imagine how cool it would be if you used glow in the dark yarn i really wanted to do that but couldn t get ahold of any sadly so without further talking let s head right into the making of these cuties materials to make the ghost you will need a 2 5mm crochet hook yarn in your prefered 2 colors plus yarn for the facial features a tapestry needle and scissors a stitch marker to help you keep track of the start of the round please note that you can make the ghost using any size crochet hook and yarn weight for a smaller or bigger result using dk yarn and a 2 5mm crochet hook the ghost should be about 10-15cm tall stitches & abbreviations the pattern is written using us crochet terms in continuous spirals you will need to know the following kinds of stitches to make him magic_ring magic_ring chaining single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet trebble crochet tc optional decrease decrease preferably using the invisible decrease method increase increase if you like what i m doing please consider following me over at twitter @rinamogrynaart and/or supporting me on ko-fi @rinamogryna <3
